 Mustex couldn't believe he had been so stupid(or that he had gotten 
this far without any complaints). With his sword spinning he jumped 
on his opponents back, stabbing the blade savagely into his back.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  For the first time since he came on line Megaton felt he had 
pushed 
> his enemy to far. Mustex was fighting so agressively even he felt 
> fear for his life. Then he saw what blinded by anger Mustex did 
not, 
> the child was ungaurded. He was barely able to defend let alone 
> attack, but finally he saw an opening and rushed at the baby.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> >  Mustex became incredibly angry at his desire to attack the 
> > defenceless bot.
> > Mustex:You monster. I won't let you win.
> > Megaton:Like you have any choice.
> > Mustex:I WON'T LET YOU WIN!
> >  Music from the dragonball z movie "Bardock the Father of Goku" 
> from 
> > just after Bardocks crew died starts playing(ha ha ha) and Mustex 
> > furiously charges at Megaton.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > > Megaton:I'm Megaton. Learn it well because if you don't get out 
> of 
> > my 
> > > way it will be the sound of your doom. That kid has to much 
> > potential 
> > > I won't lose my spot as the most powerful bot in the universe.
> > >  They continued dueling. Mustex was stronger than in the 
> future,but 
> > > not as experienced so Megaton had the advantage.

> > grabbed

He 
> > > drew 
> > > > his bow.

The 
> > > > creature spat out a sword made of ice, transformed to his 
> > freakish 
> > > > robot mode, and met him head-on.
> > > > Musex:Who are you?
> > > >

> have 
> > > > been

> > > offline.

> lost 
> > > the 
> > > > > protoform. Worse yet the new bot looked like a BABY, it had 
> to 
> > be 
> > > > > weak now, but it could be a formidable opponent in the 
future 
> > if 
> > > it 
> > > > > went through the same gradual upgrades as humans. He 
wouldn't 
> > > allow 
> > > > > it to happen. HE was the maost powerful bot in the 
universe, 
> > and 
> > > it 
> > > > > would stay that way. He transformed to dragon mode and spit 
> > fire 
> > > at 
> > > > > the 2 bots...
> > > > >

I'll

Pilgrims

but

to 
> > his 
> > > > > freakish
> > > > > > robot mode from his dragon form cut his size by four. he 
> > > scanned 
> > > > > the area
> > > > > > and found a hidden cave nearby. He needed rest and the 
cave 
> > > would 
> > > > > offer
> > > > > > enough concealment.

> > youth,  
> > > > from 
> > > > > what he
> > > > > > could tell the youth was human, a tribe of the useless

> > > > weak

> > > > to 
> > > > > show they

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden charge 
> of 
> > > > energy 
> > > > > forced
> > > > > > the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand and

> > > > > > energy signature only to find nothing had happened to 
him. 
> > The 
> > > > > scanns did
> > > > > > reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, 
and 
> > mud 
> > > > had 
> > > > > coated
> > > > > > his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were 
> drawn 
> > > an 
> > > > > hour ago
> > > > > > instead of  years past.

> > > > > > The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two 
pods 
> > > > weren't 
> > > > > far
> > > > > > away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went to 
> > > > > investigate. once
> > > > > > nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the looks 
> of 
> > > > things 
> > > > > there
> > > > > > was a mother, father and baby. A mighty swing of the 
> monsters 
> > > > tail 
> > > > > remedied
> > > > > > the family situation killing the mother (leaving the baby 
> and 
> > > > > fathers DNA to
> > > > > > be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he 
> continued 
> > > to 
> > > > > the pod
> > > > > > where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he 
> > > recognized.
